data.text:
"People caught up in crisis around the world cannot pay the price for this war."

In the face of an impending hunger catastrophe brought on by the war in Ukraine, @antonioguterres outlines recommendations to prevent humanitarian disaster. https://t.co/oehT5vPsne

On Wednesday's International #SportDay, hear from elite athletes & Olympians how sport can help promote #ClimateAction and address the climate emergency.  https://t.co/h99WRPx4ul https://t.co/zyS3w7utfN

Women in science are paid less & face more professional obstacles than their male counterparts.

🔬Meet 7 women who defied all odds & helped change the world for the better: https://t.co/oaRvXb2MLg https://t.co/DFoX6IGovW

Cultural heritage is both a testimony of the past & a catalyst for a more peaceful future.

In Ukraine, @UNESCO is working with cultural professionals to support them with emergency measures to protect the country's irreplaceable cultural heritage. https://t.co/YdNzUJTJy8 https://t.co/7gkOaeb6MI

Sport is a powerful tool to promote respect, tolerance & solidarity, contributing to the achievement of the #GlobalGoals.

More on Wednesday's International #SportDay: https://t.co/DzA43IxVHJ https://t.co/zcZcjLMj61

While the latest @IPCC_CH climate report was yet another stark warning about the urgent need to address the climate emergency, here are 8 reasons not to give up hope and take #ClimateAction. 
https://t.co/FXOhTuS45j

Join our virtual #SportDay event on the role of sport in addressing the climate crisis and hear from athletes & sporting industry experts about how they are taking #ClimateAction.

🗓 6 April, 9:30am EDT
Register ➡️ https://t.co/a0t4NpEVvg https://t.co/MLt4DM7xqZ

Ukraine:

"The war was started by choice. 

There is no inevitability to it or to the suffering it is causing. 

The UN is ready to do everything within its means to help bring an end to it."

-- UN political chief @DicarloRosemary to Security Council. https://t.co/mlNQp6yk6H https://t.co/ndoPGG4JKS

Sexual exploitation, abuse & trafficking are just some of the risks people face as they flee Ukraine.

@Refugees is providing support & protection advice to vulnerable people. 

You can help: https://t.co/wZR5NdAic3

https://t.co/h63XLiMjGb

99% of the world's population breathes air with unhealthy levels of fine particulate matter & nitrogen dioxide.

We need urgent #ClimateAction to our protect health and well-being. https://t.co/tmd1SQejPW via @WHO https://t.co/DqsZfj1hD7

Even wars have rules.

Civilians and civilian infrastructure are #NotATarget. 

More from @UNOCHA: https://t.co/tt7RiwkLgi 
https://t.co/wEvipqwTha

Now, more than ever, we must commit to do more to promote cultural and religious tolerance, understanding and dialogue.

Tuesday is the International Day of Conscience. 

https://t.co/DBvsTC3RVQ https://t.co/jsxYG0f5dR

Tuesday is the International Day of Conscience. 

In the face of on-going global challenges and conflicts - let's focus on promoting tolerance & solidarity and helping those in need. https://t.co/DBvsTC3RVQ https://t.co/Bj1FuNO5Dn

Ukraine: "It is vital that all efforts are made to ensure there are independent & effective investigations into what happened in Bucha to ensure truth, justice & accountability"

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet.
https://t.co/Y8bKoIjyr7

Climate promises must be turned into #ClimateAction now, @antonioguterres stresses, following release of latest @IPCC_CH climate report which says we can avoid climate catastrophe if we #ActNow. https://t.co/ioENVOod20 https://t.co/Lzn0qKJKOv

Transforming institutions & governance is key for achieving the #GlobalGoals 

This week, public administration experts will gather for their annual meeting to share solutions to address some of the biggest challenging facing humanity. 
https://t.co/7ZGV9VDAdV via @UNDESA https://t.co/8WaGd7UYhR

On Monday's #MineAwarenessDay, we celebrate the women and men who protect civilians from explosive hazards. 

Learn how @UNMAS works around the world to reduce threats & create #SafeGround for all. https://t.co/KmYriwGy50
 https://t.co/J0Y91sQIvB

Protecting life on land means:
🌳 sustainably managing forests,
🏜️ combating desertification,
🌾 stopping & reversing land degradation,
🐘 and ending biodiversity loss.

Together we can make the #GlobalGoals a reality. https://t.co/QCEKAVOItV https://t.co/STZIzlBcbW

Despite numerous challenges, our @UNMAS colleagues continue their vital work clearing landmines & explosive remnants of war.

They are working to create a world where people don't have to be afraid of their next step.

More on Monday's #MineAwarenessDay: https://t.co/KmYriwGy50 https://t.co/61aEt1VrQJ

Afghanistan: The denial of education violates the human rights of women & girls and can leave them more exposed to violence, poverty and exploitation.

All students must be allowed to exercise their right to an education. https://t.co/RLTlfBdZAi

Landmines & explosive remnants of war impede the path to peace & development. 

Ridding the world of these deadly weapons would allow individuals & communities to live in safety.

More from @UNMAS on Monday's #MineAwarenessDay: https://t.co/KmYriwGy50 https://t.co/dqFbuZdgyK

Educating yourself 📚
Learning from others 💭
Teaching children and youth 🧒

These are just some of the ways you can take action to #FightRacism.

Diversity is part of our shared humanity. Let's embrace it. 
https://t.co/lmBLVk3qxU https://t.co/Bh3xhwp38b

"Net-zero promises must be matched by concrete #ClimateAction."

This week, @antonioguterres launched his expert group on net-zero commitments, together with @cathmckenna, the chair of the high-level group. 
https://t.co/jNfFChLEym https://t.co/6mVikz0MEY
Happy birthday to our UN Messenger of Peace Jane Goodall (@JaneGoodallInst), and thank you for your tireless commitment to protecting the environment! https://t.co/wQi01uWLPO https://t.co/yDbHv6L9Ra

4 million people have fled Ukraine to seek safety in other countries.

As the UN works tirelessly to help those affected by the war, see how we can all take action to stand #WithRefugees. https://t.co/wZR5NdiGNt via @Refugees https://t.co/MrRSvuCfDK

Globally, 121 million unintended pregnancies happen each year.

Join @UNFPA in calling for greater efforts to address gender inequality and the lack of proper healthcare, which are contributing to the trend. https://t.co/M1EPXDtdCE https://t.co/bHkTmav03b

"Educated girls become educated women who lift their families & communities into a better future."

At Afghanistan pledging conference this week, @antonioguterres stressed the need for full inclusion of women & girls to protect the country's future. https://t.co/9ZznrY8GEI https://t.co/7mdtyERejy

Civilians and civilian infrastructure are #NotATarget. 

They must be protected. 

At all times. https://t.co/55fWsJ2Hj3

Afghanistan: When women can’t access life-saving medical care, @UNFPA brings it to them 🚑

Mobile health teams provide reproductive health care and protection service to women & girls in need.

Learn more about their work: https://t.co/44LhuI12ij https://t.co/m9CP90GTij

#Ramadan is a time for peace, compassion and supporting the most vulnerable. 

Ramadan Kareem to all who are celebrating! https://t.co/6b5gBfArIh

The #GlobalGoals aim to empower people with autism & leave no one behind. 

Find out more on Saturday's #WorldAutismAwarenessDay: https://t.co/N6vQWZjuFy https://t.co/FnllYEfNKY

"Imagine a world where every job is based on clean, renewable energy, where wind & solar power is even more abundant."

-- @UNEP Young Champion of the Earth @nzambimatee_ke
 explains the role of sustainable energy in building a better future https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA #ClimateAction https://t.co/PRfhTK1GZr

"We need to ensure that the rights, perspectives & well-being of persons with disabilities, including those with autism, are an integral part of building forward better from the pandemic."

-- @antonioguterres on #WorldAutismAwarenessDay. https://t.co/wjCkL8Z4h6 https://t.co/kxXHg0KNsk

Forced to run for their lives.
Forced to leave their homes.
Forced to be apart from family.

This war must stop. 
The people of Ukraine need peace -- now.
 
You can help support @Refugees here: 
https://t.co/wZR5NdAic3 https://t.co/NodhrfHorT

People with autism have the equal right to make their own decisions & choices like everybody else.

More on Saturday's #WorldAutismAwarenessDay: https://t.co/RuQIeTeyKG https://t.co/wdwfngixyg

Afghanistan: @UNFPA remains committed to providing reproductive health and protection services to women & girls.

To provide humanitarian assistance to 9.28 million people this year, they will need $251.9 million in support.

Learn more their efforts: https://t.co/44LhuI12ij https://t.co/0ANZSAoHJT

"This truce must be a first step to ending Yemen’s devastating war."

@antonioguterres welcomes agreement to halt all offensive military air, ground & maritime operations inside Yemen & across its borders.  https://t.co/L8OH4ee10J https://t.co/8RzdHZTZkx

War is not the answer.

We need peace.

Peace for the world.

We need peace now. https://t.co/nMmShXZING

#COVID19 spreads most easily:

➡️ in crowded settings,
➡️ in closed spaces with poor ventilation, 
➡️ through prolonged contact with an infected person. 

More facts from @WHO: https://t.co/VJFhT1o2Ze
 https://t.co/0Y0aL76Vwk

The Russian invasion of Ukraine has created a dire humanitarian & refugee crisis.

Stay informed about how the UN is responding & learn how you can support those impacted by the suffering & destruction. https://t.co/cs4XHAMymI

Monday is #MineAwarenessDay. 

The Safe Ground, Safe Steps, Safe Home exhibit brings attention to those living in constant fear due to landmines, as well as the work being done to clear these deadly devices.

https://t.co/nFkmtEmKIC via @UNMAS https://t.co/YjyWz0vyBz

The United Kingdom assumes the rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of April.

Follow @UKUN_NewYork for updates. https://t.co/vuBq8ExGbW https://t.co/kynppBK9DD

Afghanistan: The international community has pledged USD 2.44 billion in assistance for the country, which faces a dire humanitarian crisis.

The aid will go to help nearly 25 million Afghans dependent on humanitarian support to survive. https://t.co/Iq9yrVxU7a

South Sudan: With nearly 9 million people in need of aid, UN launches USD1.7 billion humanitarian response plan to provide urgent, life-saving assistance and protection to the most vulnerable. https://t.co/fh8ePizA6L

"We stayed, we delivered, and we are determined to keep delivering."

At Afghanistan pledging conference, @antonioguterres says the UN is prepared to continue providing humanitarian aid to millions of Afghans. https://t.co/9ZznrY8GEI https://t.co/E5QcjR42Ov

Racism, discrimination and xenophobia harm us all.

But everyone, everywhere can take action to spread compassion, tolerance and acceptance.

Get ideas about how YOU can help #FightRacism. https://t.co/cCd3JjLrsV https://t.co/t47SsNCzGn

More than half of Afghanistan’s population needs life-saving assistance. 

On Thursday, the international community will come together to show support for helping Afghans affected by this growing humanitarian crisis. https://t.co/zvyqJ28E09 https://t.co/43RXSPyMNc

The UN is working tirelessly to support people whose lives have been uprooted by the war in Ukraine. 

From delivering life-saving medical supplies to providing basic necessities like food & shelter, learn about our efforts to help. https://t.co/eX16SnexeC

"When we consider the costs of war, prevention & peacebuilding are a bargain & prerequisites for a better future."

@antonioguterres says peacebuilding is a proven investment. https://t.co/8nu1VQNZr1 https://t.co/2wKYoqxPQI

2 million children have fled the war in Ukraine to seek safety in other countries. 

2.5 million children are displaced within the country. 

60% of all Ukrainian children have been forced from their homes. 

See how @UNICEF is supporting them. https://t.co/ijXuqqcfaU

"The terror & agony of the Ukrainian people is palpable and is being felt around the world. 

They want the war to stop and to return to peace, safety & human dignity."

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet. https://t.co/AkjJzC0Yfp

Nearly half of all pregnancies globally are unintended.

@UNFPA says gender inequality & lack of proper healthcare are fueling the trend, which could have negative impacts on the well-being of women & girls, as well as efforts to achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/nmDDp1AjRp

4 million people have now fled Ukraine. 
~6.5 million are displaced inside the country
~13 million are stranded in affected areas or unable to leave. 

UNHCR is providing essentials to those affected by the war. 

You can help: https://t.co/Y1gEggqapG via @Refugees https://t.co/GJqDqH7jN6

🚲 Bicycles in Lebanon
🌀 Wind turbine in Sudan
🌊 Protection for the Nile in Egypt

See more inspiring #ClimateAction ideas from the Middle East & North Africa during @UNFCCC #MenaClimateWeek: https://t.co/NGydLZhbok

If you are you between 15 and 29 years old and passionate about the #GlobalGoals, here's your chance to be one of the next #SDGYoungLeaders! 

Apply before 31 Mar: https://t.co/SRg6PDDble via @UNYouthEnvoy https://t.co/CuBs5SBX23

"Stand united against racism. Tackle inequities & inequalities. Learn & educate about the past & build societies based on dignity, respect, justice &  opportunity for all."

-- @antonioguterres at #UNGA #RememberSlavery event. 
https://t.co/Oy15wXxi4T

“In some neighborhoods, it’s not even safe to bury the dead.”

At least 1,100 civilians have been killed in a month of war in Ukraine, with at least 99 children among the dead and injured, @UNOCHA's @JoyceMsuya tells Security Council. https://t.co/nVwxXikChM

In times of crisis we must come together as one team. 

Join the #Football4Ukraine players as they stand together to support people driven from their homes by the war in Ukraine: https://t.co/kEcEDTZUoW via @Refugees & @WFP https://t.co/vHeqrTIP9d

Amid deteriorating security in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, @MONUSCO chief Bintou Keita calls for comprehensive political strategy that includes measures to address root causes of conflict.
https://t.co/dhmZXaX6vL

Millions of Ukrainians are at risk of food insecurity warns @FAO.

The ongoing war has severely disrupted food production and made food and aid delivery extremely difficult. 
https://t.co/52XQ5H9C4K

The spread of misinformation during a crisis makes it harder for people to understand what's happening.

Not everything you see online is true.

❌ Don't share rumours.
✅ Choose content from reliable sources.

#PledgetoPause & verify facts before sharing. https://t.co/qFqoh7loX2 https://t.co/91Ibu0A2lD

🔹 Consent of the parties
🔹 Impartiality
🔹 Non-use of force except in self-defence & for protecting civilians

These three principles guide the deployment of @UNPeacekeeping operations. https://t.co/8euWunN44Q https://t.co/QN3Aa5MXqX

"Together we can – and we will – build a future of peace, dignity & prosperity for all."

At #GlobalGoals Forum, @AminaJMohammed stresses that from transformative education to social protection & safeguarding our planet - we have the power to take action. https://t.co/jhAVe7yyaB https://t.co/6vlpK1GdJ7

Unless the current trajectory is corrected, Sudan will head towards economic & security collapse & significant humanitarian suffering, @UNITAMS head @volkerperthes warns Security Council. https://t.co/VTzxzj4O2D https://t.co/Ua1YNDkcjX

First-ever Middle East & North Africa Climate Week, #MenaClimateWeek, opened Monday with a strong call to accelerate #ClimateAction & implementation of the #ParisAgreement.

More from @UNFCCC: https://t.co/wESNV0aUr3 https://t.co/0SqU1Kip0u

Ukraine: "The United Nations is doing everything in its power to support people whose lives have been overturned by the war."

-- @antonioguterres says nearly 900,000 people have received food, shelter, blankets, medicine, bottled water & hygiene supplies. https://t.co/gD1A7g0P1T

Ukraine: "Today we were able to safely bring food rations, medical supplies & household items to Kharkiv for thousands of people." 

-- @UN_Ukraine's @OsnatLubrani. https://t.co/NxTCLxG7QO

 https://t.co/u7EEnWIIEs

Ukraine: @antonioguterres calls for immediate humanitarian ceasefire to allow for progress in political negotiations, delivery of essential humanitarian aid & safe movement of civilians. 

A cessation of hostilities will save lives & prevent suffering. https://t.co/OxW450czwm https://t.co/JwtERwarbg

As millions of people around the world flee violence, persecution, war or disaster, we can all stand #WithRefugees, wherever they may come from. 

Support UNHCR to help those in need:  https://t.co/tlL4sEt5bR via @Refugees https://t.co/46Pa93KtpO

On any given day, @WFP teams coordinate an average of 

5,600 trucks🚚
100 aircraft✈️
30 ships🚢 
and a network of 650 warehouses🏚️ 

to deliver assistance to people all around the world.

Learn more: https://t.co/2S8MokhIjc https://t.co/G2wlMThnKV

During these uncertain times, it's normal to feel fearful, sad, angry & anxious.

😴 Take care of yourself
📱 Learn to recognize misinformation
💛 Spread compassion

@UNICEF has more tips on how to cope when you feel overwhelmed. https://t.co/ubs5eiEUuJ https://t.co/EfvEuukhDS

The #GlobalGoals are our blueprint to achieve a better & more sustainable world.

Learn more about the 17 Goals created to transform our future. https://t.co/Ss4uMcXdcV https://t.co/pxAOOyF5Ka

The climate emergency can seem daunting, but we have the solutions to solve this crisis. 

From renewable energy to green technologies & individual #ClimateAction steps, all of us can #ActNow to help protect our planet & our future. 
https://t.co/OY6qiLBq9t https://t.co/y1BOYxHbLh

The Russian invasion of Ukraine has created a dire humanitarian & refugee crisis.

See how you can stay informed & support those impacted by the suffering & destruction.
https://t.co/cs4XHAuWY8

Civilians and civilian infrastructure are #NotATarget. 

They must be protected. 

At all times. https://t.co/VhqClv978R

The UN is made up of dedicated women & men around the world who:

🇺🇳 Feed the hungry
🇺🇳 Vaccinate children
🇺🇳 Promote development
🇺🇳 Protect civilians
🇺🇳 Mediate conflicts
🇺🇳 Support refugees & migrants
🇺🇳 Advance human rights
🇺🇳 Stay & deliver to give hope to those in need https://t.co/63HvWmzYCP

“This is about humanity's future. 

 This is about making sure that the world right now is liveable.”

-- @lizwathuti calls for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/ZDmA7P1YnB https://t.co/gooSE5Kfob

Every 2 weeks, the world loses an indigenous language, and with it, its entire cultural & intellectual heritage.

Indigenous languages matter - and must be protected. https://t.co/06C4Y8AWWz  #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/Eh3BOTt5mD

In every language -- and around the globe -- women and girls have solutions to the biggest challenges facing humanity. 

Gender equality can help the world tackle climate change, boost economic growth and achieve the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/xhDC9tQEd6 https://t.co/3EaxfoySs8

Fossil fuels account for 75% of greenhouse gas emissions & 90% of carbon dioxide emissions, making them the largest contributor to the climate crisis. 

As our world warms faster than ever, here's more about the causes & impacts of the climate emergency: https://t.co/f8HNhpDm2C https://t.co/EYtt547WYw

🏋🏽 Exercise regularly
🍛 Eat healthy foods
😴 Get enough sleep
🍺 Limit alcohol intake
🗣 Talk about your feelings

During these uncertain times, @WHO has more tips on how to improve your mental well-being: https://t.co/OnDy1tcXwe https://t.co/LnQhbjzDqE

Lights out! 

UNHQ in NYC went dark for Saturday's #EarthHour. 

Here's how you can take #ClimateAction all year round: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/GUcbOF6sPN

1 in 5 people who have lived through war experiences mental health issues. 

Mental health support is not a luxury -- it is an essential service for people forced to flee.

https://t.co/0pRVxrIPOp via @Refugees https://t.co/6GQY8t64Cw

From Afghanistan to Zimbabwe, from mountains to the seas, the impacts of the climate emergency are widespread & varied.

3.45 billion people living in climate hotspots around the world are already feeling the effects. 

We need urgent #ClimateAction now. 

https://t.co/6PXMUtLlS8 https://t.co/x6aVE7g4CT

The war in Ukraine is threatening the lives and well-being of millions of people.

Amid the suffering and destruction, the UN is working to support the most vulnerable whose lives have been uprooted. https://t.co/eX16SnexeC https://t.co/HuI132hG3v

Saturday's #EarthHour is a good reminder that small #ClimateAction steps can make a big difference.

Join us and turn off your lights for an hour at 8.30pm local time - wherever you are. https://t.co/UuZ1z3hQPc

.@UNICEF and @Refugees have set-up Blue Dot centres in countries bordering Ukraine to provide protection, information & much-needed comfort for families fleeing the war. 

Learn more about how they are helping people in need. https://t.co/zqxYZMb7c0

Afghanistan: All students, including girls, must be allowed to go back to school.

The Taliban's announcement that secondary schools for girls will remain closed violates the human rights of women & girls. https://t.co/fZBCfrQWPC https://t.co/n3AjofmKN9

It's ok not to be ok. 

During difficult times, it is completely normal to feel anxious, isolated or overwhelmed.

Talking about your feelings with your family and friends can help improve your mental health. https://t.co/zJAXLHwdUm

"This launch risks triggering a significant escalation of tensions in the region & beyond."

-- UN political chief @DicarloRosemary says intercontinental ballistic missile launch of Democratic People’s Republic of Korea is flagrant breach of moratorium. https://t.co/WIcCcuXKN9

Ethiopia: @antonioguterres welcomes declaration of indefinite humanitarian truce & ceasefire.

The conflict has caused terrible suffering for millions of people. 

These positive developments must now translate into immediate improvements on the ground.  
https://t.co/0IxgRH5Ncu
